alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Dickson; Hickman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 4:28PM CST until February 17 at 8:41PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Cheatham, Davidson, Dickson, Hickman, Macon, Montgomery, Robertson, Smith, Sumner, Trousdale, Williamson and Wilson. * WHEN...Until 730 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 428 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Springfield, Dickson, Ashland City, Lafayette, Nashville, Hartsville, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Coopertown, White Bluff and Belle Meade. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
